resources.string: "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."

"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

Would you like to save session?
Pan and zoom the image with your fingers.

Buy full version to get redo feature and much more effects and also more adjustment options, in addition to all of these you will get Magnify Glass View which would make super easier to paint to small areas.
Buy Color Splash Pro for more features!
Do you want to delete image?
Unlock to move photos out of grids?
Buy Color Effect Pro for more features!
Color Effect Paid version provides you fully working UNDO feature and option to save multiple SESSIONS and multiple SIZE options and many more.
Buy full version to get Magnify Glass View which would make super easier to paint to small areas.
Best size for using this app very efficiently.
Most efficient size for sending to mobile devices.
The following is useful information for the developer. Please do not edit.
Please indicate if you are using a custom rom.
Use selection tool to select eyes.
"If you click this part of the tool you can resize the select tool. "
You can start over with another image by clicking on this button.
This button will make your image black and white except your eyes.
"If you choose eraser you can clear extra colors from your eyes with your fingers "
or you can choose move button and zoom in so you can edit easier.
"You can use undo button if you didn't like your editing."
You can save final images to your SD card.
Or you can change the selected color of your eyes
"If you move along the X axis it wil change the width of the tool. "
Also if you move along the Y axis it will change the height of the image
Tap on this part of the select tool to move select tool around.
This part needs to be over the eye that you are selecting.
After selecting done simple click on to done button and use selection tool for other eye too.
You can zoom in or out with pinch zooming.
This silders will let you choose perfect color for your eyes.
"After color selection is done just click on the 'Done' button"
Do you really want to quit?
Would you like to start with a new image?
"Your \"file selector app\" didn't return with a proper image path, please use another file selector app to select image properly!"
You can ZOOM IN and ZOOM OUT by pinch zoom (By sweeping two fingers different direction)
Buy HDR FX Pro to get access on Red, Green, Blue channels!
Buy HDR Fx Pro for more features!
Choose smaller size if save fails.
If you apply selected effect, your previos adjustments will be overridden!
Do you like HDR FX? Get pro version to use it on FULL RESOLUTION images.
Purchase HDR FX Pro to remove ads!
Saving image to the SD card.
Saving full resolution image to the SD card.
You need to check Unsharp Enable Checkbox first!
Erase the painted area to original color.
Lets you move your canvas by touching the screen and zoom in-out via pitch to zoom.
This application lets you to change colors of your photos and edit them like a pro!
Lets you see which part of the image has been painted.
Lets you to paint your image with touching the area.
This app is working only with image files, please select an image file.
Buy pro version to use this feature!

"Application won't record video without microphone permission! Please grant microphone permission."
"Application won't work without storage permission! Please restart the application and grant storage permission."
You need to give permission to read and write to sdcard to be able to use this app!

Could not download files, please make sure device has internet conntection!

Create most beautiful collages with the easiest way!

Post entire photos on instagram without cropping!
Make your photos extra fun with PiP Cam!
Make your photos extra fun with PiP Collage!
